str2: Finally, from now on, henceforth, beyond that. Neuter singular of the same as loipoy; something remaining.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To wait for, expect. From ek and dechomai; to accept from some source, i.e. to await.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Hated, hostile; subst: an enemy. From a primary echtho; hateful; usually as a noun, an adversary.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.
A footstool. Neuter of a compound of hupo and pous; something under the feet, i.e. A foot-rest.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The foot. A primary word; a 'foot'.
